an10.61:1.1: “Purima, bhikkhave, koti na pannayati avijjaya: ‘ito pubbe avijja nahosi, atha paccha samabhavi’ti.
an10.61:1.2: Evancetam, bhikkhave, vuccati, atha ca pana pannayati: ‘idappaccaya avijja’ti.
an10.61:2.1: Avijjampaham, bhikkhave, saharam vadami, no anaharam.
an10.61:2.4: Pancapaham, bhikkhave, nivarane sahare vadami, no anahare.
an10.61:2.7: Tinipaham, bhikkhave, duccaritani saharani vadami, no anaharani.
an10.61:2.10: Indriyaasamvarampaham, bhikkhave, saharam vadami, no anaharam.
an10.61:2.13: Asatasampajannampaham, bhikkhave, saharam vadami, no anaharam.
an10.61:2.16: Ayonisomanasikarampaham, bhikkhave, saharam vadami, no anaharam.
an10.61:2.19: Assaddhiyampaham, bhikkhave, saharam vadami, no anaharam.
an10.61:2.22: Asaddhammassavanampaham, bhikkhave, saharam vadami, no anaharam.
an10.61:3.1: Iti kho, bhikkhave, asappurisasamsevo paripuro asaddhammassavanam paripureti, asaddhammassavanam paripuram assaddhiyam paripureti, assaddhiyam paripuram ayonisomanasikaram paripureti, ayonisomanasikaro paripuro asatasampajannam paripureti, asatasampajannam paripuram indriyaasamvaram paripureti, indriyaasamvaro paripuro tini duccaritani paripureti, tini duccaritani paripurani panca nivarane paripurenti, panca nivarana paripura avijjam paripurenti;
an10.61:3.2: evametissa avijjaya aharo hoti, evanca paripuri.
an10.61:4.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, uparipabbate thullaphusitake deve vassante (…) tam udakam yathaninnam pavattamanam pabbatakandarapadarasakha paripureti, pabbatakandarapadarasakha paripura kusobbhe paripurenti. Kusobbha paripura mahasobbhe paripurenti, mahasobbha paripura kunnadiyo paripurenti, kunnadiyo paripura mahanadiyo paripurenti, mahanadiyo paripura mahasamuddam sagaram paripurenti;
an10.61:4.2: evametassa mahasamuddassa sagarassa aharo hoti, evanca paripuri.
an10.61:5.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, asappurisasamsevo paripuro asaddhammassavanam paripureti, asaddhammassavanam paripuram assaddhiyam paripureti, assaddhiyam paripuram ayonisomanasikaram paripureti, ayonisomanasikaro paripuro asatasampajannam paripureti, asatasampajannam paripuram indriyaasamvaram paripureti, indriyaasamvaro paripuro tini duccaritani paripureti, tini duccaritani paripurani panca nivarane paripurenti, panca nivarana paripura avijjam paripurenti;
an10.61:5.2: evametissa avijjaya aharo hoti, evanca paripuri.
an10.61:6.1: Vijjavimuttimpaham, bhikkhave, saharam vadami, no anaharam.
an10.61:6.4: Sattapaham, bhikkhave, bojjhange sahare vadami, no anahare.
an10.61:6.7: Cattaropaham, bhikkhave, satipatthane sahare vadami, no anahare.
an10.61:6.10: Tinipaham, bhikkhave, sucaritani saharani vadami, no anaharani.
an10.61:6.13: Indriyasamvarampaham, bhikkhave, saharam vadami, no anaharam.
an10.61:6.16: Satisampajannampaham, bhikkhave, saharam vadami, no anaharam.
an10.61:6.19: Yonisomanasikarampaham, bhikkhave, saharam vadami, no anaharam.
an10.61:6.22: Saddhampaham, bhikkhave, saharam vadami, no anaharam.
an10.61:6.25: Saddhammassavanampaham, bhikkhave, saharam vadami, no anaharam.
an10.61:7.1: Iti kho, bhikkhave, sappurisasamsevo paripuro saddhammassavanam paripureti, saddhammassavanam paripuram saddham paripureti, saddha paripura yonisomanasikaram paripureti, yonisomanasikaro paripuro satisampajannam paripureti, satisampajannam paripuram indriyasamvaram paripureti, indriyasamvaro paripuro tini sucaritani paripureti, tini sucaritani paripurani cattaro satipatthane paripurenti, cattaro satipatthana paripura satta bojjhange paripurenti, satta bojjhanga paripura vijjavimuttim paripurenti;
an10.61:7.2: evametissa vijjavimuttiya aharo hoti, evanca paripuri.
an10.61:8.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, uparipabbate thullaphusitake deve vassante tam udakam yathaninnam pavattamanam pabbatakandarapadarasakha paripureti, pabbatakandarapadarasakha paripura kusobbhe paripurenti, kusobbha paripura mahasobbhe paripurenti, mahasobbha paripura kunnadiyo paripurenti, kunnadiyo paripura mahanadiyo paripurenti, mahanadiyo paripura mahasamuddam sagaram paripurenti;
an10.61:8.2: evametassa mahasamuddassa sagarassa aharo hoti, evanca paripuri.
an10.61:9.1: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, sappurisasamsevo paripuro saddhammassavanam paripureti, saddhammassavanam paripuram saddham paripureti, saddha paripura yonisomanasikaram paripureti, yonisomanasikaro paripuro satisampajannam paripureti, satisampajannam paripuram indriyasamvaram paripureti, indriyasamvaro paripuro tini sucaritani paripureti, tini sucaritani paripurani cattaro satipatthane paripurenti, cattaro satipatthana paripura satta bojjhange paripurenti, satta bojjhanga paripura vijjavimuttim paripurenti;
an10.61:9.2: evametissa vijjavimuttiya aharo hoti, evanca paripuri”ti.
